channel.title: How to change the Client/Server name? [Help Please]
channel.description: Okay i changed everything involved with the old clients name to my clients name and saved everything, But when i log in it still says "Welcome to (the old server) " .. And i changed ALL of it, i changed all the ::vote and ::donate links to my website but they keep going to the old website.. Help?

item.title: How to change the Client/Server name? [Help Please]
item.dc:creator: @Sinthavong Sinthavong
item.description:
@Sinthavong wrote:

I changed anything and everything but it still shows up like that

Read full topic
item.source: How to change the Client/Server name? [Help Please]

item.title: How to change the Client/Server name? [Help Please]
item.dc:creator: @Resent Resent
item.description:
@Resent wrote:

Sinthavong:

Okay i changed everything involved with the old clients name to my clients name and saved everything, But when i log in it still says "Welcome to (the old server) " … And i changed ALL of it, i changed all the ::vote and ::donate links to my website but they keep going to the old website… Help?

Go into config.java and client.java. Search the old servers name and change whatever comes up to the new servers name.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change the Client/Server name? [Help Please]
